Through NYU's Museum Gateway, students get free admission to some of New York City's best cultural institutions. Browse the full list below, or see it as a map . Please note that the Whitney Museum of American Art will be closed until Spring 2015 during their move downtown.                                                    The Frick Collection                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   1 East 70th Street, New York, NY 10021   frick.org                                                                  Grey Art Gallery                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   100 Washington Square East, New York, NY 10003   nyu.edu/greyart                                                                  The Jewish Museum                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at museum shop   1109 Fifth Avenue, New York, NY 10128   thejewishmuseum.org                                                                El Museo del Barrio                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at La Tienda museum shop   10% discount at El Café   1230 5th Avenue, New York, NY 10029   elmuseo.org                                                                Museum of the City of New York                                 Free admission for NYU students plus one guest (student must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at museum shop   1220 5th Avenue, New York, NY 10029   mcny.org                                                                Museum of Modern Art                                 Free admission and film tickets for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   11 West 53rd Street, New York, NY 10019   moma.org                                                                Museum of the Moving Image                                 Free admission for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   15% discount in the Museum Café and the Moving Image Store     36-01 35th Avenue, Queens, NY 11106   movingimage.us                                                                  New Museum                                 Free admission for NYU students (must present current NYU ID)   235 Bowery, New York, NY 10002   newmuseum.org                                                                The New-York Historical Society                                 Free admission for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at Museum Store   170 Central Park West at 77th Street, New York, NY 10024     nyhistory.org rmanyc.org                                                                The Studio Museum in Harlem                                 Free admission for NYU students (student must present current NYU ID)   10% discount at Museum Store   144 West 125th Street, New York, NY 10027     studiomuseum.org                                                                  Whitney Museum of American Art                                 Free admission for NYU students plus one guest (must present current NYU ID)   20% discount on Whitney publications and select products at the Whitney Store   10% discount at Untitled, the Whitney’s new Danny Meyer restaurant   Currently closed: The Whitney will reopen in Spring 2015 at 99 Gansevoort Street in the Meatpacking District     whitney.org                          NYU Faculty and Staff may enjoy free admission to several Museum Gateway institutions. For the complete list, please visit the Faculty & Staff Access page.                                         Visit the Grey Art Gallery   Located on Washington Square East, the Grey Art Gallery is the university's fine arts museum and is always free to the NYU community. Click here to find out more.                                       Planning a Group Visit?   If you are planning a free group trip to one of the Museum Gateway institutions listed above, please contact the museum directly to arrange your visit ahead of time.                 Please note that the list of participating institutions is subject to change and may grow throughout the semester.              Discover Other Museums   Below are a few New York gems that aren't a part of NYU's Museum Gateway. Ticket prices vary — some offer special free nights for students, others require a donation of any dollar amount.            The Metropolitan Museum of Art   American Museum of Natural History   National Museum of the American Indian   Guggenheim Museum   The Morgan Library and Museum            American Folk Art Museum   The Hispanic Society of America   The Paley Center for Media   South Street Seaport Museum   Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum                                                                      Faculty & Staff Access                               Several Museum Gateway institutions also offer free admission to NYU faculty and staff.
